hypothesis_content.title: Political Memecoin (TRUMP) Decoupling During BTC Neutrality
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a tight 3% range for 3+ consecutive days (NEUTRAL regime), politically-themed memecoins (TRUMP) will decouple and trend based on real-world political news flow, offering uncorrelated alpha opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During BTC range-bound periods, capital seeks narrative-driven opportunities. Political memecoins are purely sentiment-driven and respond to real-world events. Low correlation to BTC confirms decoupling. Volume spike indicates new attention.
entry_conditions: Major political news/event occurs (election poll, debate, policy announcement)
TRUMP price correlation to BTC over past 5 days < 0.3

exit_conditions.take_profit: TRUMP moves +15% from entry independent of BTC
exit_conditions.stop_loss: TRUMP moves -8% from entry OR BTC breaks out of range (>±5%)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 72 hours after entry or next major political event

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: TRUMP continues to track BTC despite news, or political news fails to generate sustained trading interest.
